reviewText:
Should be labeled  "Live at Bonnaroo" instead, because that is actually what this is. It's also misleading to write that Dolly Parton is a guest artist on this show when all they have done is to put an old video of Kenny and Dolly performing "Islands in the stream" (from 1983 or 1984 in very bad sound and picture quality) as the final cut on this DVD.
But for those who are Kenny fans, anything you can buy of live performances is interesting, although this is not his best concert. The sound and procuction is really not all that good and Kenny looks tired and very out of place when Lionel Richie does All night long....
